short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add interesting profiles, and potential leads and prospects directly from LinkedIn to your Notion workspace.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add interesting profiles, and potential leads and prospects directly from LinkedIn to your Notion workspace.

No more missing out on prospective leads you come across on LinkedIn. No more manually entering details for the leads. One click is all it takes. One click, and the profile gets saved to your Notion database. Organize your lead management process any way most suited to your needs. The extension will handle the data import, you can take it up from there.
